Package controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is used to implement controller for the ModifyProduct form.

    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    addAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used to add an existing part from record to the associated parts list of the product.
    (package private) void
    cancelAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used to exit the AddProduct form and return to the Main form.
    void
    initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
    This is used to display both the part and associate part tables in the AddProduct form, and to modify existing products using the new entries entered.
    private void
    mainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used to create action event so other methods can return to the Main form.
    (package private) void
    removeAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used to remove part(s) associated with the product.

    saveAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used to update a Product object by saving the modified field texts and associated parts.

    searchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used to search existing part from record.
    (package private) void
    searchKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
    This method is used to display all parts from record if the search field is left empty.

    • addAction

      void addAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used to add an existing part from record to the associated parts list of the product.

    • cancelAction

      void cancelAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to exit the AddProduct form and return to the Main form. It will erase existing field texts if it's confirmed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • removeAction

      void removeAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used to remove part(s) associated with the product.

    • saveAction

      void saveAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to update a Product object by saving the modified field texts and associated parts.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • searchAction

      void searchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used to search existing part from record.

    • searchKeyPressed

      void searchKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      This method is used to display all parts from record if the search field is left empty.

    • mainMenu

      private void mainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to create action event so other methods can return to the Main form.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • validMin

      private boolean validMin(int min, int max)
      This method is used to create alert error if the minimum value entered is not valid.
